name: Floreantpos-1
tagline: Dockerized version of the popular Floreant POS
body:
### Welcome to Floreant POS for Docker!
This is a project where I'm working on a secure POS system with automatic PCI compliance/security, analytics/insight, and configuration management.  Step one is to to Dockerize the Floreant POS system.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
